Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: People wanted to keep themselves informed on various issues last week. Sport enthusiasts caught up on the health updates of AFL players Jeremy Hull Darcy Moore and Nathan Kruger while political observers kept a close eye on the developments in the Liberal Party and the upcoming budget's commitment to mental health. Cairns residents pray the council rate's claim does not go through which would make it the highest rate rise in a decade. Overall people are watching closely for significant developments in their areas of interest that could impact their lives in different ways.
